reviews.text: This place was just okay. Disappointed they didn't serve tacos.
reviews.name: Brenda

reviews.text: Really enjoyed our meal. Had the steak and it was super tender. Would totally come back again.
reviews.name: Madi

reviews.text: I wanted to like this place but they didn't have Cheetos Mac and Cheese. Two thumbs down for this stinky place.
reviews.name: Katie

reviews.text: The coconut shrimp salad was excellent. I would totally love to eat here every night!!!
reviews.name: Lulu
